tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE leads (
  lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  lead_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  lead_source VARCHAR(100),
  lead_owner VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  lead_created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE leads (
  lead_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  lead_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  lead_source VARCHAR(50),
  lead_created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE deals (
  deal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  deal_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  deal_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  deal_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  deal_closed_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE LeadGeneration (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(50),
    lead_source VARCHAR(50),
    lead_contact_info VARCHAR(100),
    lead_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE LeadQualification (
    qualification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    qualification_date DATE,
    qualification_status VARCHAR(20),
    qualification_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES LeadGeneration(lead_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DealClosing (
    deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    closing_date DATE,
    deal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    deal_status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES LeadGeneration(lead_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Leads (
  lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_name TEXT,
  lead_status VARCHAR(50),
  lead_contact_info JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE SalesReps (
  rep_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  rep_name TEXT,
  rep_email TEXT,
  rep_phone VARCHAR(15),
  rep_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Opportunities (
  opp_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  opp_name TEXT,
  opp_status VARCHAR(50),
  opp_value DECIMAL,
  opp_closed_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Deals (
  deal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  deal_name TEXT,
  deal_status VARCHAR(50),
  deal_value DECIMAL,
  deal_closed_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE contacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    task_description VARCHAR(255),
    task_due_date TIMESTAMP,
    task_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE opportunities (
    opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    opportunity_name VARCHAR(255),
    opportunity_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    close_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE deals (
    deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_id INT,
    deal_name VARCHAR(255),
    deal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    deal_status VARCHAR(50)
);
